Donetta Roberts
===============

****Current Term: November 2024 - November 2027****
Email Donetta Roberts:
[donetta.roberts@cibolotx.gov](mailto:donetta.roberts@cibolotx.gov)

Donetta Roberts is a native Texan who has proudly called Cibolo home since 2004. A graduate of Calallen High School in Corpus Christi, she later pursued higher
![Council Memeber Donetta Roberts, Place 6 At-Large](https://www.cibolotx.gov/revize_photo_gallery/Staff%20Directory/Council%20Memeber_Donetta%20Roberts.jpg?t=202503171708030)
education at the University of Texas at San Antonio, where she earned a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science. Over an impressive 31-year career in the real estate title industry, Donetta developed a reputation for exceptional customer service and strong leadership—qualities that help with responsible growth in both the residential and commercial sectors.

Prior to her current role on the City Council, Donetta served on the City of Cibolo Parks Commission, further demonstrating her commitment to enhancing community spaces and fostering local development. In addition, she is deeply involved with the Cibolo Senior Center and actively participates in Meals on Wheels deliveries to support the city’s seniors.

Donetta is also a devoted wife and mother. Married for four years to the love of her life, she cherishes her three children—aged 16, 25, and 30—while balancing her professional and community commitments. Her passion for animals is evident in her daily walks with her beloved Shih Tzu, affectionately known as her “Velcro dog.”

Currently, Donetta proudly serves as the Place Six At-Large Representative on the City Council, where she continues to work diligently to make Cibolo a wonderful place to call home.
